########################################################################
# Include python install macros
########################################################################
include(GrPython)
if(NOT PYTHONINTERP_FOUND)
    return()
endif()

add_subdirectory(bindings)

########################################################################
# Install python sources
########################################################################
GR_PYTHON_INSTALL(
    FILES
    __init__.py
    message_type_18.py
    message_type_19.py
    message_type_1.py
    message_type_21.py
    message_type_27.py
    message_type_4.py
    message_type_5.py
    message_type_6.py
    message_type_8.py
    message_type_9.py
    strobe_random_latlon.py
    strobe_random_latlon_bounding_box.py
    strobe_latlon_list_circle.py
    filter_pyais_combined.py
    filter_param_dictionary.py
    filter_bounding_box.py
    filter_distance.py
    get_params.py
    get_latlon.py
    hex_to_bytes.py
    nmea_to_nmea_bits.py
    nmea_to_opencpn.py
    pyais_tcp_connection_stream.py
    nmea_bytes_to_strings.py
    nmea_strings_to_bytes.py
    strobe_latlon_moving.py DESTINATION ${GR_PYTHON_DIR}/gnuradio/pyais_toolkit
)

########################################################################
# Handle the unit tests
########################################################################
include(GrTest)

set(GR_TEST_TARGET_DEPS gnuradio-pyais_toolkit)

# Create a package directory that tests can import. It includes everything
# from `python/`.
add_custom_target(
  copy_module_for_tests ALL
  COMMAND ${CMAKE_COMMAND} -E copy_directory ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
          ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/test_modules/gnuradio/pyais_toolkit/
)
